languages.text: {n}Иеронимус бросает взгляд на Кибеллу — спокойный, лишенный страха, присущего многим. Он тихо изрекает:{/n} "Ткач Кровавой паутины... Я слышал о вас на исповедях. Моя церковь не одобряет ваших... варварских обычаев, переходящих черту. Но мы чтим вашу преданность Ему".

{n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус бросает взгляд на Кибеллу — спокойный, лишенный страха, присущего многим. Он тихо изрекает:{/n} "Ткач Кровавой паутины... Я слышал о вас на исповедях. Моя церковь не одобряет ваших... варварских обычаев, переходящих черту. Но мы чтим вашу преданность Ему".

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus mira tranquilamente a Kibellah, sin el miedo que ves en muchos otros. Con voz sosegada, se dirige a ella:{/n} «Una tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta... Algunos me han hablado del culto en sus confesiones. Mi misión no aprueba sus... prácticas bárbaras, que a menudo son excesivas, pero respetamos su devoción hacia el Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."

Algunos me han hablado del culto en sus confesiones. Mi misión no aprueba sus... prácticas bárbaras, que a menudo son excesivas, pero respetamos su devoción hacia el Emperador».

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは落ち着いた表情でキベラを見つめている。多くの人が持っていた恐怖を持たない彼は、静かにこう言った。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手…告白の中で、あなたのカルトについて言及した人がいた。私の使命は、あなたの…一線を越えた野蛮なやり方を認めません。しかし、私たちはあなたの神への深い献身を尊敬しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは落ち着いた表情でキベラを見つめている。多くの人が持っていた恐怖を持たない彼は、静かにこう言った。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手…告白の中で、あなたのカルトについて言及した人がいた。私の使命は、あなたの…一線を越えた野蛮なやり方を認めません。しかし、私たちはあなたの神への深い献身を尊敬しています」

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯平静地看着绮贝菈，迥异于许多人见到她时流露出的恐惧态度。他以平静的声音开了口。{/n}“织血罗网的织网者……人们曾在忏悔的过程中提到了你的教派。我的教派并不赞成你们那种……野蛮的做法，你们的做法常常会跨过红线。不过，我们尊重你对神皇的虔诚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯平静地看着绮贝菈，迥异于许多人见到她时流露出的恐惧态度。他以平静的声音开了口。{/n}“织血罗网的织网者……人们曾在忏悔的过程中提到了你的教派。我的教派并不赞成你们那种……野蛮的做法，你们的做法常常会跨过红线。不过，我们尊重你对神皇的虔诚。”

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus blickt Kibellah ruhig an, ohne die Angst, die du schon bei vielen bemerkt hast. Er sagt ganz ruhig:{/n} "Eine Spinnerin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes ... Ich habe im Beichtstuhl schon von Eurem Kult gehört. Meine Mission missbilligt Eure ... barbarischen Methoden, die zu oft die Grenze überschreiten. Dennoch respektieren wir das Ausmaß Eurer Hingabe zu Ihm."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus blickt Kibellah ruhig an, ohne die Angst, die du schon bei vielen bemerkt hast. Er sagt ganz ruhig:{/n} "Eine Spinnerin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes ... Ich habe im Beichtstuhl schon von Eurem Kult gehört. Meine Mission missbilligt Eure ... barbarischen Methoden, die zu oft die Grenze überschreiten. Dennoch respektieren wir das Ausmaß Eurer Hingabe zu Ihm."

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus pose sur Kibellah un regard imperturbable, dénué de la crainte que vous avez décelée chez tant d'autres que lui, puis il prend la parole calmement :{/n} « Une tisseuse de la Toile de Sang... Certains fidèles m'ont parlé de votre culte en confession. Si ma mission n'approuve pas vos... méthodes barbares, qui ont une fâcheuse tendance à dépasser trop souvent les bornes, nous respectons néanmoins la profondeur de votre dévotion envers Lui. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus pose sur Kibellah un regard imperturbable, dénué de la crainte que vous avez décelée chez tant d'autres que lui, puis il prend la parole calmement :{/n} « Une tisseuse de la Toile de Sang... Certains fidèles m'ont parlé de votre culte en confession. Si ma mission n'approuve pas vos... méthodes barbares, qui ont une fâcheuse tendance à dépasser trop souvent les bornes, nous respectons néanmoins la profondeur de votre dévotion envers Lui. »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, sakince Kibellah'ya bakıyor. Yüzünde çoğu kişide gördüğün korkudan eser yok. Hafif bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bir Kanipi Ağı dokuru... Günah çıkaranlar, bana tarikatından bahsetmişlerdi. Misyonum... Sıklıkla çizgiyi aşan barbarca yöntemlerinizi onaylamıyor. Yine de Ona karşı kendinizi derinden adamanıza hürmet ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at Kibellah calmly, without the fear that you have seen in many. He says quietly,{/n} "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web... People have mentioned your cult to me in their confessions. My mission does not approve of your... barbaric ways, which too often cross the line. And yet we respect the depth of your devotion to Him."
